titles: Scot's Discovery of vvitchcraft proving the common opinions of witches contracting with divels, spirits, or familiars ... to be but imaginary, erronious conceptions and novelties : wherein also, the lewde unchristian all written and published in anno 1584, by Reginald Scot, Esquire.
author: Scot, Reginald, 1538?-1599.
publisher: Printed by R.C. and are to be sold by Giles Calvert ...,
